text: emi? Varu ayananu vadali itara aradhya daivalanu niyamincukunnara? Varito anu: "Mi nidarsananni tisukurandi." Idi (i khur'an) nato patu unnavariki hitabodha; mariyu na purvikulaku kuda (ilanti) hitabodhalu (vaccayi). Kani varilo cala mandi satyanni grahincaledu, kavuna varu vimukhulai potunnaru
